    • Constructor Detail

      • ValueResolverUtil

        public ValueResolverUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • initializeValueResolverExtensions

        public static void initializeValueResolverExtensions()
        This method initializes custom ValueResolver extensions using the Java ServiceLoader mechanism. It is invoked on startup of the application, and looks up all registered ValueResolverFactory in META-INF. See ValueResolver for details.

      • resolveDefault

        public static java.lang.String resolveDefault(org.openrdf.model.Value value)
        Default handling for URIs and Literals as of resolveDefault(Value, String) using ValueResolver.UNDEFINED if the value is not defined.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:

      • resolveDefault

        public static java.lang.String resolveDefault(org.openrdf.model.Value value,
                              java.lang.String def)
        Default handling for URIs and Literals.
        Parameters:
        value - The value itself (URI/Literal)
        def - The default text in case the value cannot be resolved
        Returns:
        Returns a String (= Literal) or a link (= URI)

      • resolveSystemDate

        public static java.lang.String resolveSystemDate(java.lang.String sysdate)
        Converts a system date like '2011-03-31T19:54:33' to user-readable date. If the input is not a valid system date, the value is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        sysdate -
        Returns:
